name: ashley benson
text: This location is clean and their employees are always nice and helpful. I've never had to wait too long for a special order. Food is great always hot and fresh.

name: Rebecca Gurnee
text: Don't really understand why there's no pizza portal... every other Little Caesars seems to have one, even the one in Watertown does. Would get a lot more happy customers if they had one...

name: Ken Keller
text:
It's pizza  and chicken at inexpensive price.
They don't have everything on the menu. They have no website ordering so if you call in it might get messed up. Sometimes they may have a  couple premade items ready to go.

name: Vannessa Valdez
text: Very good place amazing staff just wondering why is it close ???

name: Peggy Schuyler
text: Pizza is really good. Price is fantastic. Not much else worth getting.

name: carmen petersen
text: Better pizza in the past changed recipe not much variety

name: Sue Folts
text: I was very disappointed with the pizzas. They were cut Willy nilly, had to recut them to better slices. The bread sticks were almost raw, didn't feed them to the grandkids. I didn't want them to have stomach aches.

name: lisa houk
text: It was made fresh and tasted great as always!

name: kimberly starlin
text: Good fast cheap pizza

name: CHERI HAZARD
text: For the price, you cant go wrong on a hot n ready cheese or pepperoni pizza.

name: Don Bebee
text: Best buy around...thin is really good if not overdone.

name: Sam Maurice
text: This place is great if you like Little Caesars pizza. It's not a taste everyone has. As a Detroit native I was thrilled to have a Little Caesars open up near me. The food is usually exactly as I expect, but sometimes the breadsticks are a …More

name: T Volqswagen
text: Well it was good while it lasted but this Jefferson location has been closed for over a year now. Yummy!! Had a thin crust  ultimate supreme .

name: Christin Shouse
text: Pizza is usually decent. The crabby lady upfront needs a pep talk and a vacation.

name: In the life of skylar
text: I went into little Caesars tonight to get pizza. It was close to close. But for the FIFTH time since they brought back pretzel crust pizza they have said they are OUT again nit only that but they REFUSED to make me one TWICE  out of the …More

name: Stanley Rockwood
text: Great and cheap pizza..

name: tony sowles
text: Very hard working would buy from again

name: Terry Trz
text: Not always the cleanest place to get food, but decent pizza for a good price.

name: Russell Armstrong
text: Wife ordered 2 hot and ready and order of crazy bread..guy at the counter gave her 2 lunch special deep dish.  Called and ask about the mix up.  Was told my wife asked for the lunch special.  Was.asked if I had a receipt.  Told the manager a receipt would help if the guy entered the order wrong..she was very rude..won't be going back.

name: Autumn Beeney
text: Amazing bread sticks, but in my opinion they don't put enough sauce on the pizza.

name: Erich Utrie
text: Good pizza for the price.  Call ahead during peak times with order.  Management supportive of local schools.  Generally friendly staff.

name: Brock Mchenry
text: Pizza was ready fast, good and affordably priced.

name: Jason Koester
text: Caesar's is good. Not always as quick as we would like.

name: Dawn Engelhart
text: Food is always great. All the staff are great. Awesome atmosphere.

name: Barbara Steele
text: Foods good but after I watched an employee take an order he put his hands in the side of his pants then he went and started preping the order that was just ordered. I lost my appetite and haven't gone back

name: Thomas Rode
text: Good special order pizza, reasonably priced too.

name: Elia Inda
text: Fast easy, food is hot and ready and made to order if you have special requests.  Always  very tasty, should call ahead,  they are usually very busy.

name: Leslie Bronstad
text: Its alwys hot n gd pizza but nvr rdy like thy say

name: Monique
text: I love Little Caesars however the Jefferson location employees need to be a little bit more friendly and customer service oriented.

name: Jose Figueroa
text: Go here every time I get the chance, great place.

name: michael mcinnis
text: I read the reviews before I went in and I thought I knew just what I needed to do which was order a fresh pizza. So that's what I did. And the manager on duty when she thought I wasn't looking forward and pizza out of the hot box and gave …More

name: Tyler Addy
text: Others complain about the wait which is fair but this store gets slammed with people sometimes. Hot n ready could be hotter. I've called ahead several times in the past and it has been ready upon arrival

name: Dezntz4u Dezntz4u
text: For a truck driver passing through and delivering across the street. I found that this store was fast friendly and very helpful. I planned on a hot and ready pepperoni. But saw the limited time only ad for the Smokehouse pizza. So i ordered …More

name: Nat Hall
text: Hot and Ready Pepperoni pizza was only "ready."  The "hot" was missing.  Looked like a day-old pizza.  Dried out and totally congealed.  I really wanted to buy a frozen pizza from the Wal-mart, but my son insisted upon Little Caesars...at least now he knows better.

name: Michael Kincaid
text: Call in your order.. very fast.. no waite time.. it's why God gave us the technology.

name: Matthew Meschke
text: Took about half an hour to get our pizza

name: John Mueller
text: Quick place to get pizza!

name: Easy Money
text: Employees smoking out front... No thanks.

name: Eric Krueger
text: Very pleasant and helpful I would recommend if you are looking to grab some great pizza!!!!

name: Tim Smillie
text: Waited for one of only two employees working to acknowledge there was a line of customers waiting to order. Poor service is a sign of poor management. Left for another restaurant.

name: Djblue Streams
text: Crazy bread is good there supreme is the worst pizza I've ever had

name: Lisa Dunford
text: Food is always delicious,  hot. Staff is very kind and polite

name: Scott Guttenberg
text: Called in order. Told the price. Told when it would be done. Got there said it was never called in.

name: Josh Horneck
text: The staff could be more friendly, but I've never had any issues with poor food quality. For a cheap pizza place, they could do much worse. I will definitely be back.

name: Albert Keinonen
text: Always a huge wait for mediocre food. It's a $6 pizza for Pete's sake!

name: Tiffany Lilly
text: Never had a wrong order! Fast service

name: Deanna Moore
text: Hot and ready my ass. My receipt says 5:59 and I walked out the door at 6:30.  Ordered a sausage and pepperoni, got a cheese and sausauge.  On top of that, one of the women who looks like a meth head was slurping on a ring pop over the …More

name: Tim Alexander
text: Slow and don't have the pizza port

name: Michele Eske
text: Love there pizza and bread sticks

name: Art Sellnow
text: Fast and good.

name: samantha furan
text: Good pizza at a good price

name: Audra Mueller
text: Always good service and food!

name: John Trader
text: ALWAYS friendly service.. Wish we had one in Fort Atkinson

name: KATHY CAVANNA
text: Lunch box's are really good... not as doughy as the other's.

name: Alberto Martinez
text: Good prices good pizza

name: Allen Olson
text: Love it fast ready and great food

name: Carrie Leamy
text: Fast easy good pizza!

name: 8883 adventures
text: Nasty place you could see the disgusting condition of the kitchen from front counter the manager had no control over employees one blond haired gentleman was doing all the work while the two lady's sat and talked to each other I was a regular at this location until I noticed the condition of the restaurant

name: Mark Oellrich
text: Website said open till 9, closed before 5

name: g
text: Called 20 minutes ahead of time for a timed pick up and still didn't have order done was told would be a 5 minute longer wait.  The funniest part is the owner was working.  Really if this is how the place is ran when an owner is working it should be shut down.  No pride there what so ever

name: Lisa Gambrel
text: Excellent Pizza for decent price

name: Matt cunningham
text: Fast and easy

name: Christopher Willger
text: The pizza isnt great but for $5 its worth it

name: Tracy Fiege
text: Fair except some personalities

name: Greg Carlson
text: Little Caesars is gone

name: Delaine Endl
text: Dirty, place and workers, never again, there

name: Juan Maravilla
text: Regular

name: Austin McDaniels
text: Fast fresh Pizza

name: Sheila Lohman
text: Very polite

name: Pandx
text: Feet

name: Elena Thompson
text: Always yummy

name: ITz Anzio
text: Great service!!

name: Matt Bills
text: Good value for money

name: Haddie Panda
text: Slow service. Never have pizza ready unless you call ahead. Rude service.

name: Hope Marquardt
text: Love this pizza

name: Richard Breiby
text: Good cheese bread

name: Zhui Ri
text: Five dollars and some change for pizza. Can't beat it. The staff's alright.

name: Tara Schieldge
text: Owner was great

name: Brittany Schloss
text: Poor service.
